name: Parmesan Panko Chicken Poppers
author: alisha
summary: I was playing around in the kitchen and this is what I came up with, so I decided to share it with you. These nuggets go well with a sweet chili sauce. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut in bite-sized pieces
directions: Combine panko bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, and garlic powder in a food processor; blend until finely crushed
Put panko mixture in a bowl
Whisk eggs and milk in a separate bowl to make an egg wash
Coat chicken pieces in flour; dip them into egg wash
Press into panko mixture to coat, shaking off excess
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Fry chicken in batches, until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 3 to 5 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
